amendment.description: To provide financial aid to local law enforcement officials along the Nation's borders, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4591 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4591 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S7367-7368; text: CR S7367) To provide financial aid to local law enforcement officials along the Nation's borders, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4591 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4591 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
